name: joe
description: Node.js asynchronous testing framework, runner and reporter
readme:
# Joe [![Build Status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/bevry/joe.png?branch=master)](http://travis-ci.org/bevry/joe) Node.js asynchronous testing framework, runner and reporter ## Using [You can discover how to use Joe by referring to the `Using Page` on the Wiki](https://github.com/bevry/joe/wiki/Using). [You can check out the rest of the wiki here.](https://github.com/bevry/joe/wiki) ## History You can discover the history inside the [History.md](https://github.com/bevry/joe/blob/master/History.md#files) file ## License Licensed under the incredibly [permissive](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Permissive_free_software_licence) [MIT License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/MIT/)
